item.title: CVE-2024-22153|2024-01-31T18:21:16.817Z -- Fahad Mahmood & Alexandre Faustino -- Stock Locations for WooCommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood & Alexandre Faustino Stock Locations for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Stock Locations for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.5.9.
